channel.title: [Pi] How to make custom weapon 2 handed
channel.description:
Hello i got 2 weapons.
Zaros Godsword - This one is one handed stance (scimitar) but i can wear shields with it.. how do i change this? Twin Blade - How can i make this one 2 handed, so nobody is able to wear a shield with it??

item.title: [Pi] How to make custom weapon 2 handed

Well thanks for trying to help

item.source: [Pi] How to make custom weapon 2 handed

item.title: [Pi] How to make custom weapon 2 handed
item.dc:creator: @Paradrop Paradrop
item.description:
@Paradrop wrote:

In client.java, search for:

int[] two_hand = {

This array contains all weapons that are two-handed. So if you want your weapon to become 2handed, add the item id to the array (put it behind the { and }, like all numbers are).

If you want a weapon that is currently two-handed one-handed, just delete the item id from the array.

Read full topic
item.source: [Pi] How to make custom weapon 2 handed

item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“Niv3k, post:1, topic:380174”]Hello i got 2 weapons.

Zaros Godsword - This one is one handed but i can’t wear shields with it… how do i change this?
Twin Blade - How can i make this one 2 handed, so nobody is able to wear a shield with it??[/quote]

First, if you cant wear a shield, its two handed?
But i think you mean your stance.
